Posts.EditableText: I've been noticing lately that the Warrior Cats fans have found us. If any of them ever manage to write a complete game, we'll need a place to shove it off for quarantine to try and prevent the plague that always follows. Since we don't have a children's category either, I'd be unsure where to put it otherwise. And I imagine there's lots of other fanfic throughout the site that's gotten lost in fantasy or sci-fi or wherever.

Posts.EditableText:
You guys don't know what I've been through, the things I've seen. Warrior Cats fan stories are a tidal wave of poorly spelled softcore cat porn just waiting to be unleashed on any unsuspecting site they can find. They had to straight up ban anything remotely related to it at a CYOA site I hang out at because the site was just flooded non stop with awful stories by eight year olds for months, and they buried the forum in terrible roleplay threads. 

Though I think (hope) we might be safer here since Quest takes a bit more effort to use.
